org.araneaframework.uilib.event
Interface OnChangeEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProxyOnChangeEventListener
public interface OnChangeEventListener
extends Serializable

This interface defines a "on change" event listener that is usually attached to a listbox. This listener will receive notification when the control data is changing.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
OnClickEventListener

Field Summary
static String ON_CHANGE_EVENT
          This constant is the name of the event, that this listener listens to.
 
Method Summary
 void onChange()
          Event callback function that is called when the registered event occurs.
 

Field Detail

              throws Exception
